name: Global Farmer
storyline:
Based on real-world data from Open Street Maps, you can play anywhere in the world. Explore your own neighborhood from the perspective of a budding farmer, or try to become a successful agriculture magnate in all other locations on the planet.

Construct storage facilities, parking for your vehicles and paths to get around your farm. Purchase a variety of equipment inspired by real-world agricultural vehicles and implements.

Various environmental factors influence the growth and success of crops. Investigate different field values and choose the most effective crop rotation. Watch your income increase by planting the correct crops in the right areas. Manage many different fields in parallel and master the use of crop rotations.

Ready for a challenge? Try growing different crops on different continents. Depending on your selected region, the weather and soil conditions like soil texture or pH-value will change.

Struggling because you live in an area with little data? Use our level editor and create your own unique maps that you can share with the community on Steam Workshop.

Perform contract work to increase your revenue by delivering goods. Handle your resources wisely to fulfill orders on time. Take on increasingly challenging contracts and earn more money.
summary: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! Want to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside? Or challenge the hot sun in South America? The choice is yours!
